. A method of controlling traffic data transmission in a 5G-V2X network, the method comprising:
provisioning a plurality of traffic sensing devices (TSDs) within at least one defined geographical area of the 5G-V2X network;
provisioning an edge gateway module (EGW) for said at least one defined geographical area to be in communication with said plurality of TSDs over one or more 5G channels of said 5G-V2X network; and
provisioning each of said TSDs to provide traffic data over said one or more 5G channels to a transmission controller (TC) via said EGW;
wherein the TC dynamically adjusts a traffic data transmission frequency of at least one TSD of said plurality of TSDs in accordance with a transmission control policy.
, wherein the transmission control policy is adjustable in response to one or both of: historical traffic data; and real-time traffic data.
, wherein the historical traffic data is processed to determine a general traffic data transmission frequency f
for said plurality of TSDs and the real-time traffic data is processed to determine a safe traffic data transmission frequency f
for said at least one TSD of said plurality of TSDs such that, where f
, the traffic data transmission frequency f of said at least one TSD is adjusted to f=f

, wherein, in the event of a dangerous moving traffic object being detected within the defined geographical area, the real-time traffic data is processed to determine one or more temporary traffic data transmission frequencies f
for the plurality of TSDs or a subset of the plurality of TSDs comprising some or all of a set of source and target TSDs and, if f
for the plurality of TSDs or the set of source and target TSDs, then the general traffic data transmission frequency for said plurality of TSDs or the set of source and. target TSDs is updated to f
, wherein the method of updating the traffic data transmission frequency to the temporary traffic data transmission frequency f

is applied to only the target TSDs of the set of source and target TSDs using real-time traffic data from said target TSDs such that, once a predetermined parameter for the detected dangerous moving traffic object is met, the general traffic data transmission frequency f
for said target TSDs is reset to the normal general traffic data transmission frequency f
calculated by an empirical analyzer module.
, wherein, if a 5G-V2X network transmission delay d exceeds a predetermined, selected or calculated maximum delay value d
, then the method decreases the general traffic data transmission frequency f
for some or all of the plurality of TSDs to a new reduced value of traffic data transmission frequency f
, wherein the method applies a limit in the decrease in the general traffic data transmission frequency f

, wherein the transmission control policy is initially based on processing of historical traffic data and the resultant transmission control policy is dynamically adjusted based on subsequent processing of real-time traffic data.

, wherein each TSD of said plurality of TSDs and/or each group of TSDs of said plurality of TSDs has associated with it a respective transmission restriction module (TRM), each TRM being controlled to apply a determined or calculated transmission policy for its associated TSD or each TSD of its associated group of TSDs, said determined or calculated transmission policies comprising the transmission control policy.

, wherein the TRM collects data from its associated TSD and/or the TSDs of its associated group of TSDs and then transmits said received data over the one or more 5G channels to the TC in accordance with the determined or calculated transmission policy for its associated TSD or each TSD of its associated group of TSDs.

, wherein, for its associated TSD or the TSDs of its associated group of TSDs, the TRM counts down a waiting time for sending traffic data received at said TRM from a selected TSD in accordance with said selected TSD's determined or calculated transmission policy, then when receiving an updated transmission policy for said selected TSD, the TRM immediately updates the waiting time for sending traffic data in accordance with the updated transmission policy and sends the received traffic data on expiry of the updated waiting time, and then resets the waiting time for sending traffic data in accordance with the updated transmission policy for subsequently received data from said selected TSD.

an empirical analyzer module for processing historical traffic data received from some or all of a plurality of roadside devices (TSDs) located within a defined geographical area of said 5G-V2X network, said empirical analyzer module configured to process said historical traffic data to determine a transmission control policy for said plurality of TSDs; and

a real-time analyzer module configured to process real-time traffic data received from some or all of the plurality of TSDs to adjust the transmission control policy to provide a dynamic transmission control policy;
